item.name: Pricing
item.description: Pricing APIs enable you to add price details for one or many items.

description.content: Enables you to create one or many prices in accordance with how many items are present in the itemIds array.

item.name: Promotions
item.description: Promotion APIs enable you to apply and verify promotions and discount coupons.

description.content: Enables you to validate a cart's promotions - coupon codes and implicit promotions - for specified item IDs.
Enables you to retrieve all the active promotions, in a paginated response.
Number of records you wish to skip before selecting records. Default is `0` if not specified
limits the number of records returned by the api. Default is `10` if `limit` is not specified
Retrive records by SKU name

response.name: Successfully gets list of all active promotions.

description.content: Number of records you wish to skip before selecting records. Default is `0` if not specified
limits the number of records returned by the api. Default is `10` if `limit` is not specified
Retrive records by SKU name

response.body:
{
  "query": {
    "limit": "<number>",
    "offset": {
      "description": "Number of records skipped before selecting records. Default value is `0`",
      "example": 0
    },
    "count": "<number>"
  },
  "promos": [
    {
      "_id": "<string>",
      "promoId": "<number>",
      "promoCodes": [
        "<string>",
        "<string>"
      ],
      "promoCount": "<number>",
      "state": "EXPIRED",
      "isImplicit": "<boolean>",
      "title": "<string>",
      "startDate": "<dateTime>",
      "endDate": "<dateTime>",
      "isExclusive": "<boolean>",
      "eligiblePriceList": [
        "<number>",

      ],
      "updatedAt": "<dateTime>"
    },

        "<string>"
      ],
      "promoCount": "<number>",
      "state": "DISABLED",
      "isImplicit": "<boolean>",
      "title": "<string>",
      "startDate": "<dateTime>",
      "endDate": "<dateTime>",
      "isExclusive": "<boolean>",
      "eligiblePriceList": [
        "<number>",
        "<number>"
      ],
      "updatedAt": "<dateTime>"
    }
  ]
}

item.name: Login API
item.description:
Login endpoint generates an authorization token for local users that they can use to log into fabric copilot application.

**Note:** A local user is someone who has an active account with fabric Inc

item.name: Generate authorization token for local user

request.name: Generate authorization token for local user

description.content: Generates an authorization token using which you can access fabric APIs. Ensure that you provide valid credentials to get an authorization token.
(Required) The x-site-context is a JSON object that must contain date, and channel attributes. eg - {"date":"2020-12-12T08:00:00.000Z","channel":12}

fabric e-commerce Offers APIs allow you to to set up and manage stock keeping unit (SKU) prices. Its wide range of coupon and promotion features let you design deals ranging from single-use, customer-specific coupons to site-wide promotions.

Contact Support:
 Email: support@fabric.inc
